tool.name: Clean Orthologs
tool.description: Cleanup orthologs to extract SICO genes
tool.help:
After running OrthoMCL this tool: - extracts the single copy orthologous genes
- aligns & trims the SICO files to retain only shared non-gap sequences in reading frame
- concatenates the above trimmed SICO files for each genome into single concatemers files
- generates statistics on all the above processing steps
